name: SigNoz
author: primalheaven@example.com
description: SigNoz is an open-source observability platform with distributed tracing, metrics, and logs in a single application. This all-in-one container bundles ClickHouse, OTEL Collector, Query Service, and the Web Frontend.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
cd /mnt/server
echo "SigNoz container is pre-built. No installation required."
mkdir -p data logs
echo "Created data and logs directories."
echo "Installation complete."

variables.name: Timezone
variables.description: The timezone to use for the container (e.g., America/New_York, UTC, Europe/London)

variables.name: Web UI Port
variables.description: The port for the SigNoz web interface. Must match your primary port allocation.

variables.name: OTLP gRPC Port
variables.description: The port for receiving traces/logs/metrics via gRPC (OpenTelemetry Protocol)

variables.name: OTLP HTTP Port
variables.description: The port for receiving traces/logs/metrics via HTTP (alternative to gRPC)

variables.name: Data Retention (Days)
variables.description: How many days to retain trace/log/metric data. Increase for more history, decrease to save disk space.

variables.name: Disable SigNoz Telemetry
variables.description: Disable anonymous usage telemetry sent to SigNoz developers
